option.name: originalContent
option.value: # Deploy static sites to GitHub Pages with unified structure name: Deploy NTU Student Resources to Pages on: push: branches: ["main"] workflow_dispatch: permissions: contents: read pages: write id-token: write concurrency: group: "pages" cancel-in-progress: false jobs: deploy: runs-on: ubuntu-latest environment: name: github-pages url: ${{ steps.deploy.outputs.page_url }} steps: - name: Checkout repository uses: actions/checkout@v4 - name: Setup Pages uses: actions/configure-pages@v5 - name: Build unified site structure run: | mkdir -p public # Copy main page files cp index.html public/ cp main-style.css public/ # Copy Room Layout PowerPoint cp "Room Layout.pptx" public/ || echo "Room Layout.pptx not found, skipping..." # Copy Clubs & Societies Explorer mkdir -p public/ntu-clubs cp -r "NTU Clubs & Societies Explorer"/* public/ntu-clubs/ # Copy Airport Guide with updated styling mkdir -p public/airport-guide cp -r "Airport Guide/v2"/* public/airport-guide/ # Update airport guide to use consistent styling if [ -f public/airport-guide/2-style.css ]; then mv public/airport-guide/2-style.css public/airport-guide/style.css fi if [ -f public/airport-guide/2-script.js ]; then mv public/airport-guide/2-script.js public/airport-guide/script.js fi if [ -f public/airport-guide/2-index.html ]; then mv public/airport-guide/2-index.html public/airport-guide/index.html fi # Add navigation link back to main page in airport guide if [ -f public/airport-guide/index.html ]; then sed -i '//a Back to Hub' public/airport-guide/index.html fi # Add navigation link back to main page in clubs page if [ -f public/ntu-clubs/index.html ]; then sed -i '//a Back to Hub' public/ntu-clubs/index.html fi - name: Upload artifact uses: actions/upload-pages-artifact@v3 with: path: public - name: Deploy to GitHub Pages id: deploy uses: actions/deploy-pages@v4

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: # Deploy static sites to GitHub Pages with unified structure name: Deploy NTU Student Resources to Pages on: push: branches: ["main"] workflow_dispatch: permissions: contents: read pages: write id-token: write concurrency: group: "pages" cancel-in-progress: false jobs: deploy: runs-on: ubuntu-latest environment: name: github-pages url: ${{ steps.deploy.outputs.page_url }} steps: - name: Checkout repository uses: actions/checkout@v4 - name: Setup Pages uses: actions/configure-pages@v5 - name: Build unified site structure run: | mkdir -p public # Copy main page files cp v1/index.html public/ cp v1/main-style.css public/ # Copy Room Layout PowerPoint cp "v1/Room Layout.pptx" public/ || echo "Room Layout.pptx not found, skipping..." # Copy Clubs & Societies Explorer mkdir -p public/ntu-clubs cp -r "v1/NTU Clubs & Societies Explorer"/* public/ntu-clubs/ # Copy Airport Guide with updated styling mkdir -p public/airport-guide cp -r "v1/Airport Guide/v2"/* public/airport-guide/ # Update airport guide to use consistent styling if [ -f public/airport-guide/2-style.css ]; then mv public/airport-guide/2-style.css public/airport-guide/style.css fi if [ -f public/airport-guide/2-script.js ]; then mv public/airport-guide/2-script.js public/airport-guide/script.js fi if [ -f public/airport-guide/2-index.html ]; then mv public/airport-guide/2-index.html public/airport-guide/index.html fi # Add navigation link back to main page in airport guide if [ -f public/airport-guide/index.html ]; then sed -i '//a Back to Hub' public/airport-guide/index.html fi # Add navigation link back to main page in clubs page if [ -f public/ntu-clubs/index.html ]; then sed -i '//a Back to Hub' public/ntu-clubs/index.html fi - name: Upload artifact uses: actions/upload-pages-artifact@v3 with: path: public - name: Deploy to GitHub Pages id: deploy uses: actions/deploy-pages@v4
